name: Oxxxymiron
description: '''Miron Yanovich Fyodorov''' ({{langx|ru|Мирон Янович Фёдоров}}; born 31 January 1985), known by the stage name '''Oxxxymiron''',{{efn|Sometimes rendered as ''Оксимирон'' or ''Oksimiron''<ref>{{Cite web |last=Scott |title=Scandalous rap confession of Oksimiron: who is Zhigan and why did the rapper mention Ukraine - Global Happenings |url=https://globalhappenings.com/entertainment/33209.html |access-date= |website=Global Happenings |language=en-US}}</ref>}} is a Russian rapper and former CEO of the Booking Machine [[Talent agent|booking]] agency, as well as a co-founder and former member of the record [[Record label|label]] Vagabund. He is one of the most influential and prominent hip-hop performers in Russia, and his albums ''The Wandering Jew'' and ''Gorgorod'' are considered by the community as the most important releases of Russian rap.
